items.badge_description: You've checked in at 3 venues! Beer tourists know the best way to explore town is with a pint in hand. Celebrate your next special occasion with a guided brew tour. Claim 10% savings on premier brewery tours now.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 485 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 98!

Lovers of little green cones rejoice. National IPA Day is pretty much like your best birthday! Whether you love hazies, milkshake, double, triple, or even quad IPAs just check in one today to earn this coveted badge.

A global celebration of beer, International Beer Day toasts to beers from all across the globe. Like a helles from Germany, a tripel from Belgian, or an ESB from Britain. Cheers to you, wherever you might be in the world!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 200 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 41!

beer.beer_name: Schmamba Fruit Pizza (Sugar Cookie, Strawberry, Blueberry, Orange)

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 30 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 7!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 480 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 97!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 430 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 87!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 330 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 67!

At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 5 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black, Schwarzbier, or Mild - Dark. Try 5 more for Level 2!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 80 different Lagers! Try 5 more to unlock 17.

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 220 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 45. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 5 different Pilsners. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 80 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 17!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 475 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 96!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 425 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 86!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 325 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 66!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 220 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 45! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 35 different beers with the style of Fruit Beer, Sour - Smoothie / Pastry, or Sour - Fruited (Gose or Berliner Weisse). Try 5 more for Level 8!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 195 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 40!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 140 distinct venues!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 420 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 85!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 130 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 27!
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 4 years on Untappd!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 320 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 65!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 470 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 95!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 75 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 16!

items.badge_name: International Axe Throwing Day (2022) sponsored by WATL
items.badge_description: Grab a hatchet, cock your arm behind your head, and propel an axe forward toward a target. You’ve just become an axe thrower! Celebrate this unique, diverse sport on International Axe Throwing Day on June 13th, 2022.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 415 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 84!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 75 different Lagers! Try 5 more to unlock 16.

Ahoy schwarz-buckler! Beware of the evil Black Beerd, as you sail the dark sea of suds matey. That's 30 different beers with style of Schwarzbier or Lager - Dark. Try 5 more for Level 7! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
